reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 549/06: PRESCRIBED TIME PERIOD - SUBSECTION 51 (52.4) OF THE ACT
reg_info.reg_name_text: PRESCRIBED TIME PERIOD — SUBSECTION 51 (52.4) OF THE ACT
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 549/06: PRESCRIBED TIME PERIOD - SUBSECTION 51 (52.4) OF THE ACT

content.content:
1.
For the purposes of subsection 51 (52.4) of the Act, the prescribed time period is 60 days.  O. Reg. 549/06, s. 1; O. Reg. 69/18, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 1. For the purposes of subsection 51 (52.4) of the Act, the prescribed time period is 60 days.  O. Reg. 549/06, s. 1; O. Reg. 69/18, s. 2.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).  O. Reg. 549/06, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).  O. Reg. 549/06, s. 2.
